text: nirakarippavarkal avarkalutaiya tutarkalai nokki, "niccayamaka nankal unkalai enkal pumiyiliruntu veliyerri vituvom; allatu ninkal enkal markkattirkut tirumpivita ventum" enru kurinarkal, appotu"niccayamaka nam inta aniyayakkararkalai alittu vituvom" enru avarkalin iraivan avarkalukku arivittan
